p: The essential oil was dissolved in 2% DMSO, and a serial dilution was prepared in Muller Hinton broth. After the stirring, 180 μl of each concentration was added to the plate wells. Then, a suspension of bacteria cells (10 7 CFU/ml, 20 μl) was added to each well. After adding resazurin, all the plates were incubated at 37°C for 24 h. The smallest concentration of essential oil that shows no color variation was considered as the MIC.
